body.name: 5PCS Portable Silverware Set with Case, Lengnoyp Travel Camping Utensils Set, Premium Stainless Steel Travel Cutlery Set, Reusable Safe Flatware Sets for Lunch Box/Workplace/Students, Silver
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 37 mins
features: ✅【Health and Environmental Protection】 Healthy life begins with healthy silverware set, Lengnoyp camping silverware constructed by high quality rust-resistant food grade stainless steel, healthy, corrosion-resistant and easy to clean.
✅【High Quality Material】 Reusable utensil sets are made of stainless steel which enhances the surface hardness, avoid the scratch on the flatware when using.

✅【Ergonomic Desgin】 This premium camping utensils have a exquisite appearance, designed to provide a good grip for adults and students. The travel utensils can be paired with any style of kitchen to meet the basic dining requirements of everyone.

✅【Wide Application】 Portable cutlery set with case is small in size and light in weight, making it easy to carry around. Travel cutlery in a upgraded carrying case is a indispensable for daily, office workers, students, camping outdoor cooking, hiking, picnic, home travel and eating on the go.

✅【What You Get】 5 PCS silver utensil set include 1 X knife , 1 X fork, 1 X spoon, 1 X chopstick, 1 X carrying Case. We provide lifetime warranty and a 60-day refund or replacement for no reason. Your satisfaction is our highest priority.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Lengnoyp Travel Utensils With Case • Lengnoyp is committed to the production, processing, sales of stainless steel silverware set hardware factory. In the past 10 years, Lengnoyp has do OEM for many well-known brands. • Many high-end hotels and palaces in more than 20 countries in Europe and America are using our cutlery set.

About Lengnoyp Travel Utensils With Case • Lengnoyp is committed to the production, processing, sales of stainless steel silverware set hardware factory. In the past 10 years, Lengnoyp has do OEM for many well-known brands. • Many high-end hotels and palaces in more than 20 countries in Europe and America are using our cutlery set.
Reusable Utensils Set With Case Dinner Knife 7.2IN Dinner Fork 6.8IN X 1IN Dinner Spoon 6.8IN X 1.4IN Chopsticks 7.1IN Carrying Case 7.9IN X 2.7IN

Advantage Travel Silverware Set With Case • Portable utensils set with case is made of high quality stainless steel, not easy to bend, no odor, healthy for daily use, corrosion resistant and durable. • Portable silverware set through 16 processes of processing and polishing, rounded edges, a glossy mirror-like surface that tastes especially good while you're eating. Cutlery is super easy to care for, easy to clean and not easy to collect stains. • Portable silverware set with case is easy to carry around, upgraded carrying case is solid. Reusable silverware is a must-have for a meal, lunch box/camping/dorm/adults.

Precautions for Use • Please wash the flatware sets with warm soapy water before first using to wash off any residue left from the manufacturing process. • Please clean and dry the flatware set after using for your healthy daily use, stored in dry or ventilation place for durability. • Please do not use iron wire to scratch the pieces to keep their smooth surface. • This utensil sets for lunch is dishwasher safe so you can run it in dishwasher to save your labor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and durable!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to carry with you..easy to keep track of with durable case and easy to clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for work lunches
reviews.reviewText: This set was medium weight. sturdy and the case is pretty. Zipper on case is strong and functions well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for lunches
reviews.reviewText: The product is great quality. The silverware is normal length but very small in your hand and thin. I don’t mind it, but someone that prefers bigger utensils might not like it. The chopsticks are shorter than I’m used to, but are very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good size decent weight.
reviews.reviewText: I’m an adult male and was concerned they would be too small but the utensils are adult size. The chopsticks however are are the exact same length as the other utensils so they are about two inches shorter than standard chopsticks making them awkward for me to use but as an inexpensive lunch set I have no complaint.If the chopsticks were expandable I’d give them 5/5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soooo Handy for at Work!
reviews.reviewText: This 5 piece silverware set is the perfect companion to keep in my part-time job 'go bag' that I carry each shift! The silverware is a good quality with a very good finish and has a quality feel/weight/balance to the set. The small zipper bag is also perfect for keeping the silverware contained and clean. I have already recommended this set to another coworker and would buy it again if I were to need another set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great set of utensils. Easy to carry with the included pouch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is very convenient. I use this to take my forks/knives etc to work. I carry them in my work bag, so when I go on my lunch break I have something to eat with. Very nice product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for working husbands
reviews.reviewText: We had the recycled plastic composite ones before and they melted a bit in the dishwasher. These metal ones are great! They a small and compact to fit in any lunch bag and wash great.
